website_summaries.verdict: Space-saving, portable air conditioner, fan, and dehumidifier in one, for spot-cooling small interior areas.
pros: Use to cool small indoor spaces like bedrooms or garages
Window kit and exhaust hoses (with hose installation kit) come with it
Easily visible LCD display with light-touch controls, or use the included remote control
Speed cooling and two-level fan features allow you greater control
cons: Some buyers thought this air conditioner was too loud, and that it wasn't as durable as they wanted

customer_reviews.title: Order 10k BTU unit for under $200 from Walmart. Same exact unit but higher capacity and less money.
customer_reviews.text: The 10,000 BTU unit is cheaper here on amazon yet has no reviews. The 10k version is also $199 from Walmart online. I purchased this for over $40 more than the higher capacity unit. Let me be clear, the unit is precisely the same with a higher BTU rating. Besides the fact I feel slighted it is a good AC. The manual is very poorly written but the build quality is high. The lights flicker in my room every hour due to this running so I'm not sure how I feel about energy efficiency. The window kit is painstakingly bad. Poorly written is really an understatement as I had to improvise with the parts included.
customer_reviews.author: shelley

customer_reviews.title: Blows Cold
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Blows cold. I have a little 150 sqft shed turned into a bedroom and it works like a charm. Came timely and in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I love it, great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this portable AC unit for my daughter who is currently living in the Bahamas. She told me she coulding sleep some nights because the heat. Despite all the bad reviews, I gave it a chance anyway. Once she received it, she plug it and work. Her room usually in the high side of 92 Fahrenheit during the day, while thus little a.c. running; now its in the 75 to 80.
customer_reviews.author: D'Faro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased and satisfied so far. I like the dehumidifying feature.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo C.

customer_reviews.title: Cool down my room within 15 minutes
customer_reviews.text: product itself works flawless. Cool down my room within 15 minutes, my room size is 300ft. As per shipping time, arrived on point!
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Granados Jr

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again! Well worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This portable air conditioner gets the job done! This unit is loud and we like that. We actually sleep better with the loud droning noise! For example: I'm not waking every time the cat jumps to the floor with a THUD (he's fat and heavy footed) The lights on it are intense at night if you have it in your bedroom. I toss a folded shirt over it, problem solved :) Happy air conditioning people!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed that it failed to keep place cool at temperatures ...
customer_reviews.text: Item just died after 2 months of medium duty use. Very disappointed that it failed to keep place cool at temperatures not exceeding 100°F.
customer_reviews.author: NICOLA C

customer_reviews.title: Works good - stopped cooling after 1 1/2 years
customer_reviews.text: It does the job! However, you need to assure some air can get in the room (outside air, window open a bit, air from under the door) as this machine extracts the heat very quickly and replaces it with cool air. If not, it seems to not cool so good. A little noisy however good for the cost. Reviewed one year later: unit does not cool anymore. Started slowly acting at the end of last year. Filters are clean, unit is impeccable however, not 2 years, not 2 summers and kapout! Spend for a window model
customer_reviews.author: D Y

customer_reviews.title: Very loud! Use in a garage, not a home.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly loud! So loud that it is difficult to have a conversation over. Compressor rattles a lot. It does cool off a room very well though. It would be well suited for a garage or workshop.
customer_reviews.author: Than MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware of Della and seller OneBigOutlet. This product died days after the “warranty” expired. However, there is no written warranty in the manual or online, which means my extended warranty insurance cannot cover it The manufacturer and seller refused to have any conversation and I cannot find any repair options. Big bust. And don’t count on Amazon, they wash their hands completely of any responsibility for third party sellers. Pretty expensive for a one year item. As I am writing this Amazon has offered me partial credit after several long leading to heated customer service chats.
customer_reviews.author: KSA

customer_reviews.title: Great for the So Cal Garage
customer_reviews.text: We bought this unit after browsing comparable units at Home Depot. It is VERY easy to set up, and very powerful. We have a 2 car garage, and it brings it down just enough in the summer months to make pool enjoyable in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: The Simpsons

customer_reviews.title: Great bedroom AC
customer_reviews.text: This AC has been a lifesaver. It cools my bedroom within minutes and is very easy to use. The window insert took a bit of DIY because my apartment's window frame is a little uneven. I'd highly recommend this to anyone looking to beat the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Brian E.

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my grandson room. Works great. I would recommend this product to anyone that needs a portable air conditioner. It is heavily, so if you can have someone strong to left it upstairs. You can roll it from room to room on one level.
customer_reviews.author: Anita M. Ness

customer_reviews.title: it would be a nice product, but considering after one week and it ...
customer_reviews.text: After a week the control panel no longer worked. Complained numerous times, sent photos, video and model number and they still wanted more info. I had to get Amazon involved. If the control panel worked, it would be a nice product, but considering after one week and it broke, would not recommend this product or customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L. MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cool down my bedroom while im sleeping. Every time the compressor engages it wakes me up. Ive tried to deal with it for several nights but its just too loud. However it does cool the room down.
customer_reviews.author: sam stevens jr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any room
customer_reviews.text: Great for bedrooms. My room was always the warmest part of the house. A little noisy but you get use to it. I also bought the heater version for my mother. She loves it. You can roll around to any room you want.
customer_reviews.author: Veva Berlin

customer_reviews.title: Was great until it started sounding like a jet plane
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed this unit until it began making louder and louder noises. It started making these awful sounds a little after a year of owning it. I had a neighbor who is a handyman look at it and said that it’s likely the barrings, which are impossible for even him to access. It is not made in a way that I can repair it easily. I may reach out to the company first but it’s likely I’ll have to replace it after about a year and 4 months use.
customer_reviews.author: Velari

customer_reviews.title: Does not last.
customer_reviews.text: after less than a year the temperature dial stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: I love it. My room was really hot in summer
customer_reviews.text: I love it. My room was really hot in summer. Now I can be really fresh the whole day and night. It's portable so is very easy to take it in any room that I want. Without any doubt is one of the best purchases I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, even in a space larger than it's designed for. (800 sq ft Basement)
customer_reviews.author: yooperdan

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable AC
customer_reviews.text: Nice portable AC unit cools well. Not very quiet but not very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Estonian Consul

customer_reviews.title: A great way to stay cool
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this has a lot of good features! It really does keep a room nice and cool on hot days. I also like the Dehumidify feature which I didn't know it had before I got it. But I tried it out and liked it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and not effective
customer_reviews.text: If you want a noisy 'ac unit' that can only handle dropping the room temp by one or 2 degrees. This puppy is for you! If you want something that can actually cool a room... look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Completely quit after 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: This unit starting making loud banging noises after only 5 or 6 weeks. I tried to return it but the seller said it was past my time frame to return it. We kept it since it was still cooling and we have now had it for just over a year and tonight it it just quit on us. But the mfg warranty states it’s only a 1 year warranty. I will keep trying. Over all it was very very loud and I’m only giving it two stars because it did cool the room very well.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Gannoe

customer_reviews.title: Really Cool Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Great unit, easy to install the vent and really cools well. It’s a bit pricey but it is a good appliance worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: George Haskoor

customer_reviews.title: effective unit for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: It works well for a small space. Somewhat loud, but not louder than a higher velocity fan. price is right.
customer_reviews.author: online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: Better than nothing, but for the price, it is not all that effective. Also has to be drained EVERY SINGLE TIME I use it, which is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen F

customer_reviews.title: Works great, cool my entire basement in a timely manner
customer_reviews.text: Works great, cool my entire basement in a timely manner. I live in Massahcusetts where summers can be very humid, especially in a basement which is my husbands "man cave." Great item
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Engergy Effeicent.
customer_reviews.text: The remote made me lazy... This thing works so good for the price. Hands down my favorite. Reminds me of a Central A/C i had in NC and takes a lot less power.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my sister
customer_reviews.text: My sister love it and she said it was better then she expected.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Cold and great fan (blows cold air great)
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Cools very well (cold!). Fan/blower works better than most I have experienced. I'm very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Abobby

customer_reviews.title: Size is great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Testing it in my porch now, but it will be used in my motorhome back bedroom!!!! Its a inside porch.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It works well. Just a little louder than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Galina Medvedeva

customer_reviews.title: Way to noisy
customer_reviews.text: Can't sit in the same roon when it running. Can't hear TV when it's on. Just a piece of junk for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Hiebler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the small room I needed to cool. Easy to install vent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay cool
customer_reviews.text: Great portable air conditioner the fan is great also it gets super cool
customer_reviews.author: Hithit

customer_reviews.title: Great portable Air Conditioner. Easily installed.
customer_reviews.text: Item as described, fast shipping and works great for an upstairs bedroom without central air in Central Cali where we get temps of 100° plus.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Crowder

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product for the size it is. Doesn't get as cold as I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Ted J. Brackett

customer_reviews.title: Small space cooling
customer_reviews.text: Gave this a 3. It only cools a small room. But it works good.
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: It's a default item I paid approximately 300 dollars for. It is defective right out of the box. I've had mine since June and the process to get my money back is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Joe oller

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Its great if it weren't for the remote I would have returned it. Just because its cold but not freezing how I like it.
customer_reviews.author: An Amazing Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Too loud, and it started leaking water just a few days after i installed it. Also, it does not cool my room that great. It feels like it's just an expensive fan, isntead of an AC
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shouldn't i be mad?
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the most angry purchase ive even had. This Unit is the worst, I purchased this unit for two weeks and one day it decided not to work anymore. The light is on and everything but when I press Power On it does not start the unit. Customer support? Nothing!! They dont even bother to put customer support phone number on their website. They do not respond my email. Everything is totally waste.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Y.

customer_reviews.title: I like the cold cool air on me as i sleep it eletric useage is good
customer_reviews.text: Works well with one room and it has a dehemfire

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: didnt know the hose toke up as much space as it does

customer_reviews.title: it works.
customer_reviews.text: actually used in a camper. it definitely helped keep it livable. also used in attic and it keeps that comfortable also.

customer_reviews.title: but it doesn't cool like a regular wall AC would
customer_reviews.text: It's does the job, but it doesn't cool like a regular wall AC would. It cools the room down in to a tolerable temperature at best. At worst, my fan does a better job cooling my room.
customer_reviews.author: Jovany Rojas Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a two years ago and it never worked. I called the company multiple times and they were not helpful and would not refund my money. A waste of time and money. Plus, I had to pay someone to haul it away.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the room humidity free and cold. Easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I didn't like was that it didn't come with the drain hose

customer_reviews.title: Happy to of had.
customer_reviews.text: Very glad had the machine when I did due to the central air went out in the house so it was a life savor.

customer_reviews.title: Loud unhappy with amount of water it produces.
customer_reviews.text: Have to empty the unit very frequently, if not makes a very annoying sound when ac is on. Unit is very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Had a few leaks on humid days. otherwise a decent ac unit for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Con-air
customer_reviews.text: Hose does not stay attached. Wish I could send it back.

customer_reviews.title: Cools the elk

customer_reviews.title: Works with the door open or closed..
customer_reviews.text: I love the 😎 cool air flow and it works Better than I thought,extremely happy I purchased it...😀😀😀

customer_reviews.title: The portable AC you don’t want
customer_reviews.text: It was like sleeping next to a jet engine. It also leaked. Take a pass on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Higher energy bill.
customer_reviews.text: it worked at cooling down my room instantly in about 20 minutes i felt a noticeable difference and noticed a bigger difference after a few hours.....not noisey for me, sounds like a hotel room ac but it doesn't get below 69 degrees ( and thats if its left undisturbed ) .....reason i returned it is because it drinks energy and my bill got noticeably higher because of it... ( my area charges 15.98 cents per Kw/h )
customer_reviews.author: Josh Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I really like this unit the only draw back was that I ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this unit the only draw back was that I thought a drainage hose was supposed to come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Works great, it is a little noisy but it cools ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, it is a little noisy but it cools down my room. Worth the price, and easy to inset up.
customer_reviews.author: CynChilla

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. Perfect for small rooms and doesn't take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Not noisy at all...unless you consider white noise, noisy😉
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice with several caveats.
customer_reviews.text: very nice unit. does the job in a medium sized room. Heavy 60#. A tad noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Oram

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The machine is good but the plastic venting is cumbersome and hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: LNelsonAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The window vent assembly went together easily and the air condition works well
customer_reviews.text: I unpacked it and plugged it in. Simple, simple, simple. The window vent assembly went together easily and the air condition works well. I live in southern California on a 36 foot trawler with NO outside shade and lots of window area. On an 80 degree day this unit brought the internal temperature down from nearly 100 degrees to a comfortable 76-78 degrees in less than 20 minutes. I've recommended it to a couple of other live aboard people I know.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Cody

customer_reviews.title: I believe the good reviews but do you really want to purchases a ...
customer_reviews.text: No way to contact manufacturer or seller. My unit wouldn't turn on and gave me a "water full" error, straight out of the box. There is nothing in the packaging materials or manual with contact information for the manufacturer (Della) and internet search engines yielded no results. Two emails to the seller went completely ignored. I believe the good reviews but do you really want to purchases a unit that you can't get support on if you have an issue?
customer_reviews.author: DebJ

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: We love this portable AC! The fan stays on all the time a little loud but it still worth it better than a hot room. Great investment
customer_reviews.author: Oscar G

customer_reviews.title: Air conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Its jus a ac unit. What am I supposed to write . Hey it works . Guess what im not sweating my ass off . Hoooorayyyy
customer_reviews.author: demetrius

customer_reviews.title: PORTABLE AIR CONDITIONER
customer_reviews.text: This rating is for ease of setup and usage, plus streamlined features; haven't had occasion to operate it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Best Portable AC if you want to throw away money
customer_reviews.text: at first I was really happy with this compact AC but after 3-4 months it wasn't cooling as much as it used to and I had to drain the water out every 2 days. Now I just use it as a noisy fan for my small garage. It's not worth the money, just spend a little more and get something more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Suarez

customer_reviews.title: The product cools down my small room just fine. However
customer_reviews.text: The product cools down my small room just fine. However, it leaks a ridiculous amount even thought the drain is properly plugged and tightened. I had to place the unit in a plastic bucket (about 1ft high), which then gets full overnight. I have to dump out the water everyday, otherwise it will overflow. This is probably the biggest issue, because I wanted this type of ac unit so I wouldn't have to deal with leaking. Either spend more money and buy a better window vent ac unit, or save your money and just buy a swamp cooler, because this thing leaks like no other. UPDATE: The seller contacted me directly and was able to resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Neda

customer_reviews.title: Add Another 5 Star Rating!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit for our breakroom at work. It was perfect! Easy instillation and I was impressed with how cold the air was coming out of it. I had looked at many brands before purchasing this one. I can see why it was overwhelmingly given a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decidedly mediocre, may be not worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: My bedroom has a dresser, study desk, and a queen bed. Average size room, not big. This AC takes the heat down from oven-hot to barely-livable. Have owned it for 3 months. If you know it's going to be a hot day, you need to run the unit since morning, before the building gets hot, and keep the room completely shut, so that the AC has time to "get ahead" of the heat. The room will still go up to 85F despite this AC running at full blast, but it's better than without the machine which would be 95F. On a normal summer day if it's 85F outside, it really struggles to get anywhere below 77F.
customer_reviews.author: J. Packard

customer_reviews.title: ... this unit I wasn't sure if I would be happy with its cooling effect
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this unit I wasn't sure if I would be happy with its cooling effect. It has well surpassed my expectations. It cools my 330 sq ft bedroom so well I have had to turn the therm up to 77 or it gets cold in the middle of the night
customer_reviews.author: James Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Game-Changer
customer_reviews.text: Kicks butt and makes SUCH a difference in my garage. Doesn't necessarily cool the whole space but cools whatever work area I'm in really well. I either have the vent sticking out of the side door or pokes out under the garage door, follows me everywhere and changed my summer.
customer_reviews.author: Hendo Art

customer_reviews.title: very colld
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use in a small customer trailer to use for trailer camping. Blows very cold air even on the low setting. Plan to use a hose for the drip so that I do not have to worry about the pan filling up in the night. Saw some reviews about noise but nothing is silent unless it is off. I did not think the noise was much more than a normal fan. Seems to be good quality and hope it will last me many years.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: easy to use, but..
customer_reviews.text: super easy to install and set up, but it’s most effective if you put your face directly in front of it. otherwise it’s pretty useless if the weather is over 75 degrees. not cost effective, raises your electric bill a lot. and emptying it’s water is a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Hencken

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly including the vent attachment in the window
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly including the vent attachment in the window. Amazed at the very cool air coming from this unit. It took a while to cool off my shop since it was near 100 outside, but once it did, the thermostat worked well in keeping it at the desired temperature.
customer_reviews.author: old Crow

customer_reviews.title: Good product, right size
customer_reviews.text: Good product, right size. Just wish these floor models didn't have such big tubes to vent out the window. Alas, this is the nature of the beast.
customer_reviews.author: Delilah A. Angulo

customer_reviews.title: There is no support if you have an issue! Buy the replacement plan!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this unit however it has drainage issues and leaks around the power chord! It is now making a terrible noise. It's on a level surface so that is not the issue. I took my unit to a repair tech and the unit is basically unrepairable. It would require cutting the main coolant line and seperating the two sections to get access to the fan assembly! There are no parts lists or repair manual for the unit either! Basically it's built to be unrepairable!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a bedroom !
customer_reviews.text: I moved into a place that only has a swam cooler. I bought this to cool my sleeping. for a normal size bedroom this words Beautifully . If you like white noise, it's excellent, cools the room to a comfortable level and lets me sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Denham

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This Product
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!! Had it under 1 year and making horrible noise. I just tried calling this number (909)595-5901 at 1:15 pm PT and it keeps ringing with no answer or even a voice mail. This is supposed to be the company? Now what?
customer_reviews.author: mmmichelle

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, broke with no replacement after a month.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a month. Customer service is horrible can't get any help. They would not replace. IMO Don't Buy, buy a better name brand.

customer_reviews.title: Does a good cooling job
customer_reviews.text: Works well once it's set up but there were NO directions, especially for cleaning the flters or emptying excess water. Remote works well with many options for operation but lettering is so tiny it's very hard to see without a magnifier. Noisy even on the lowest speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Snonh

customer_reviews.title: A little loud but still a great product

customer_reviews.text: Works well but best suited for a bedroom, not a living room / common area of a regular size. Got a good deal but need something larger / more powerful.

customer_reviews.text: works to lower the air in the area but not the best one we have used.

customer_reviews.title: Assembly instructions of the exhaust are absurdly under-described. But ...
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions of the exhaust are absurdly under-described. But the unit seems well designed is fairly quiet, cools well, and hopefully will not break down too soon.
customer_reviews.author: T. B. Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact it has an internal tank for condensation! Works great!

customer_reviews.title: 8000 BTU is not that much
customer_reviews.text: Had to go bigger because this one didn't put out enough. Great for one very small room
customer_reviews.author: MUSCLE MACHINE MAD MAN

customer_reviews.title: NOISE FACTORY
customer_reviews.text: LOUD!!!!! I mean loud as "L"!!!!!! but it cools the room
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

product_meta.title: DELLA 8000 BTU Portable Air Conditioner - Fan - Dehumidifier - Timer - Rooms Up to 350 Sq.Ft. LED Display - Self evaporation System - Timer - Window Kit - Remote Control - Wheels - White
product_meta.description:
DELLA Enjoy portable cooling with the Portable Air Conditioner. The cooling power keep a room up to 300 sq. ft. cool and comfortable and the multi speed cooling and fan and 2-way air direction help spread the air evenly throughout the room. Digital controls offer precise temperature adjustments.

Feature:

 * Designed for minimal energy consumption.
 * Program the unit to activate or shut off at preset times with the timer
 * Included remote control puts the full set of controls at your fingertips
 * LED display and simple selections control panel, including a mode selection button.
 * Temperature adjustments, and fan speed selection Full-function remote control
 * Auto-restart saves your settings for when power is restored to the unit

Specifications:

 * Type: Air Conditioner
 * Cooling Capacity: 8,000 BTU
 * Color: White
 * Fan Speeds: 2
 * Power: 120VAC 60Hz
 * Rated Input: 850W
 * Timer Setting: Up to 24 hours
 * Dehumidify: Yes
 * Water-Full Indicator: Yes
 * Adjustable Temperature: 62°F - 82°F
 * Cooling Capacity: 2.50kW
 * Refrigerant/Charge: R410A
 * Max Noise Level: 56dB(A)
 * Air Flow: 350m3/h
 * Remote control: Yes
 * Certification: ETL and UL Listed
 * Overall Dimension: 11-3/4"(W) x 14-1/4"(L) x 30"(H)

Package Include:

 * Portable Air Conditioner
 * Exhaust hose
 * Window venting kit
 * Remote control
 * User manual
feature_bullets: COOLING- 8,000 BTU Cooling power (R410A refrigerant) cover up to 300-350 sq.ft. Great for using in bedroom, home living room, office, apartment, condo, dorm, garage, workshop and other indoor spaces.
MULTI-FUNCTION - While cooling, this unit will function as a DEHUMIDIFIER. 2 Speed Cooling FAN keeps space cool during spring and fall.

DISPLAY & TIMER - LED DISPLAY and simple easy select control panel features mode selection button, up/down temperature adjustments, fan speed selection and timer. TIMER allows you to turn unit on and off at desired.

SELF-EVAPORATION - Automatic self-evaporation technology - no bucket to empty (except in some high humidity area) - Built-in dehumidifier removes up to 70 pints/24 hours with continuous drain option for long unattended operation.

WINDOW KIT - Venting it by a simple three step process with WINDOW KIT (Included). Simply connect the vent hose to the back of the unit, remove the cap from the window vent kit and connect it to the exhaust hose.
